item.title: ‘Presumed Innocent’ Star Bill Camp Breaks Down That ‘Surreal’ Explosion Scene and Asking to Take Home the Fake Head: ‘They Said No’
item.description: Somewhere in Los Angeles, there’s an impeccably detailed mold of Bill Camp’s head sitting on a shelf. He thinks of it sometimes, wondering if people pass by it or if it has just sat in the darkness si
